title: What can I do if I can't use a newly installed text input method?
answer:
[After installing an input method, you must select the input method as follows: On the home screen, go to Settings. On the All screen, touch Language & input. Select the input method and touch Default keyboard, and select the newly installed input method.]() 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111443)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111444)
